item.description: Update Rescue; INC#0385; 09:44AM; 984 N Bel Air Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cMLY0p; Bel Air; The 22 year old male (still undetermined site affiliation) was on a steep hillside in a residential neighborhood where brush clearance was being performed. He fell an undetermined distance after being struck in the back by unknown size rock, and has a non-life threatening leg injury and back pain. The LAFD rescue helicopter has safely hoisted him aboard for inflight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; AO2 BC5 BC9 E237 E27 E288 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 HR3 RA71 RA827 RH114 T37 T88 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#0385; 08:28AM; 984 N Bel Air Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cMLY0p; Bel Air; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to an adult male reportedly performing brush clearance (unknown if resident or contractor), approximately 200' down a steep hillside, when he was apparently struck in the back by unknown size rock, and has a non-life threatening leg injury. First arriving LAFD personnel have established a two line rope system, are at the patient's side, requesting an LAFD helicopter for a hoist rescue with direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; AO2 BC5 BC9 E237 E27 E288 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 HR3 RA71 RA827 T37 T88 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#0603; 11:57AM; EB 134 Fwy x 2 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SZp8wx; Eagle Rock; 52 LAFD Firefighters, working alongside Glendale and L.A. County Firefighters, took just 48 minutes to extinguish two acres acres of vegetation burning in four areas 150 yards apart, near the Glendale / City of Los Angeles border (EB 134 east of Harvey Drive), north of the CHP Communications Center, which was not directly impacted by the fire. No injury. No structures threatened or damaged. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation. No details currently available about the nearby traffic collision on the 134 Freeway, or its relationship to the fire.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E35 E42 E55 E90 EM1 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA12 T1 T12 T50 + LACoFD + Glendale FD; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0603; 11:09AM; EB 134 Fwy x 2 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SZp8wx; Eagle Rock; PRELIM: LAFD, LACoFD and Glendale FD battling four areas of (undeclared size) vegetation burning about 150 yards apart near the Glendale / City of Los Angeles border in the vicinity of the CHP Communications Center (EB 134 east of Harvey Drive). Additional reports of a traffic collision (related? on 134 Freeway?). No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E212 E250 E35 E42 E55 E90 EM1 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA12 T1 T12 T50; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0568; 10:59AM; 1043 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cLTUio; Harvard Heights; 55 LAFD Firefighters took just 14 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive firefighting operation to confine fire within a 1,080 square foot one-story home with a converted attic. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 CM42 E11 E13 E20 E211 E226 E229 E26 EM1 EM13 EM9 RA11 RA13 RA26 RA52 RA826 T11 T26 T29; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0568; 10:59AM; 1043 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cLTUio; Harvard Heights; 55 LAFD Firefighters in offensive firefighting operations at a 1,080 square foot one-story home (built 1900) with heavy smoke and fire showing from fire in a converted attic.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM42 E11 E13 E20 E211 E226 E229 E26 EM1 RA13 RA26 RA826 T11 T26 T29; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0568; 10:45AM; 1043 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cLTUio; Harvard Heights; PRELIM: One story home, with heavy smoke and fire showing from an apparent attic fire; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 E11 E13 E226 E229 E26 RA26 RA826 T26 T29; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0142; 04:51AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: 82 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 34 minutes. Crews had to make their way over 150' deep into the large building filled with shelves of textiles to reach the seat of the fire. There are no injuries reported. A small amount of fire was quickly extinguished in the building adjacent to the fire unit. Crews will remain on scene through the morning conducting overhaul operations which will impact traffic in the area. Due to the size of the fire, LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR15 AR21 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E2 E203 E209 E21 E215 E221 E233 E5 E9 EA1 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA17 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0142; 04:06AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; Building size updated to approximately 200' x 400'. Firefighters are continuing to make their way into the building to conduct an offensive attack on heavy fire to the rear (Charlie side). This incident is at the Greater Alarm status. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E221 E233 E5 E9 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:17AM; 1820 E 48th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DWMchm; Central-Alameda; Large one story commercial building, approximately 100' x 300' with fire showing towards the rear. Additional resources requested (shown in this alert). ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E1 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E221 E233 E5 E9 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
